mapper.sql: ConvertID, FileID, FileTypeId, FileBucket, FileKey, FileSize, FileMd5, AddTime, AddUser, ZipFileMd5, IsZip, WorkType, ResultType, RecycleStatus, RecycleBatch
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ConvertID, a.FileID, a.FileBucket, a.FileKey, a.FileSize, a.FileMd5, a.ResultType, b.FloorName, b.FloorId, b.OrderId FROM FILE_CONVERTRESULT as a left join FILE_CONVERTFLOORSRESULT as b on a.ConvertID = b.ResultId WHERE a.FileID = #{versionId:CHAR}
and a.RecycleStatus = 0 and (a.ResultType = 2 or a.ResultType = 5 or a.ResultType = 6 or a.ResultType = 7 or a.ResultType = 9) and a.filekey is not null
a.RecycleStatus = 0 and (a.ResultType = 2 or a.ResultType = 8) and a.filekey is not null
ORDER BY b.OrderId desc
mapper.insert: insert into file_convertresult (ConvertID, FileID, FileTypeId, FileBucket, FileKey, FileSize, FileMd5, AddTime, AddUser, ZipFileMd5, IsZip, WorkType, ResultType, RecycleStatus, RecycleBatch ) values (#{convertid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{filetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filebucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{filemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipfilemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iszip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resulttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recyclestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recyclebatch,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update file_convertresult
FileID = #{fileid,jdbcType=CHAR},
FileTypeId = #{filetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FileBucket = #{filebucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FileKey = #{filekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FileSize = #{filesize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FileMd5 = #{filemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AddUser = #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZipFileMd5 = #{zipfilemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsZip = #{iszip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WorkType = #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ResultType = #{resulttype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RecycleStatus = #{recyclestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RecycleBatch = #{recyclebatch,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ConvertID = #{convertid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update file_convertresult set FileID = #{fileid,jdbcType=CHAR}, FileTypeId = #{filetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FileBucket = #{filebucket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FileKey = #{filekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FileSize = #{filesize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FileMd5 = #{filemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AddUser = #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZipFileMd5 = #{zipfilemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsZip = #{iszip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WorkType = #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ResultType = #{resulttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RecycleStatus = #{recyclestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RecycleBatch = #{recyclebatch,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ConvertID = #{convertid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
